00059 // A run-time mask is used so as to enable multipe types.
00060 const unsigned int ADT_INVALID_OPTION_MASK_MISSING_TRANSLATION_TABLE = 0x1;
00061 const unsigned int ADT_INVALID_OPTION_MASK_MISSING_EXPERIMENT_CHP    = 0x2;
00062 
00063 enum ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM {
00064   // ADT_VERBOSE_NULL, 0: quiet, don't output anything. 
00065   ADT_VERBOSE_NULL,        
00066   // ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, 1: the only option respected by the Windows Console
00067   // This means "exceptions" have to be written to this level of verbose.
00068   // The "exception" verbose level is only respected by the command line tools.
00069   ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL,
00070   // ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION, 2: command line only. When used the log messages
00071   // will report to the log file but not the command-line console. Note
00072   // that this behavior is not respected by the Windows console.
00073   // Exceptions for the Windows console must be written ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL.
00074   ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION,
00075   // ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES, 3: Outputs information related to input files
00076   // that may help with understanding calling. The most common log
00077   // message through out the application. 
00078   ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES,
00079   // ADT_VERBOSE_CALL, 4: Specific to GeneCall and the calling algorithm.
00080   // Use this to see why a call was made. 
00081   ADT_VERBOSE_CALL,
00082   // ADT_VERBOSE_TMI, 5: Too much information level is used for
00083   // output of common problem touch points in the code base.
00084   // Any verbose level specified > 5 is reduced to 5. There is no level
00085   // greater than TMI. 
00086   ADT_VERBOSE_TMI,
00087 };
00088 
00089 // Environment
00090 class RunTimeEnvironment
00091 {
00092 
00093 public:
00094 
00095   // Program
00096   std::string        m_programName;
00097 
00098   unsigned int       m_invalidOptionsMask;
00099 
00100   // Verbose.h
00101   std::string        m_verboseLogName;
00102   ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM   m_currentVerbosity;
00103 
00104   //Profiling
00105   Profile            m_programTime;
00106 
00107   std::map< std::string, Profile* > m_profiles;
00108 
00109   // Options
00110   ADTOptions        m_adtOpts;
00111 
00112   RunTimeEnvironment() {
00113     m_currentVerbosity = ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL;
00114   };
00115 
00116   ~RunTimeEnvironment() {};
00117 
00118   void initializeRunTimeEnvironment();
00119 
00120   void setVerbosity(ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM level);
00121 
00122   void profilesReport(float totalSeconds = 0);
00123 
00124 };
